page.title: 06CLUBS & SOCIETIES
page.content: { Many children and adults take advantage of the wide range of clubs and associations in{Gainford. In the village there are 3 churches and they all have associations attached to them. In{St.Mary's (C.E.), there are 3 clubs; the Parochial Church Council, St.Mary's Women's Fellowship and the Bell Ringers.The {Weslyan Chapel}has the Women's Guild, at{St.Osmand's R.C. Church}there is a Women's Guild and a Women's Institute. In the village there are three sports' clubs, playing football, badminton and tennis. The{village hall}is used by a variety of clubs such as table tennis and the Youth Club. Other associations in the village include cubs, scouts, brownies, guides and a playgroup. Some groups for adults are the Drama Club, Art Club and an active Choral Society.
